channel.title: Examples on MeVisLab Examples
channel.description: Recent content in Examples on MeVisLab Examples

item.title: Visualization Example 1: Synchronous view of two images
item.description: Visualization Example 1: Synchronous view of two images This very simple example shows how to load an image and apply a basic Convolution filter to the image. The image with and without filter is shown in a Viewer and scrolling is synchronized so that the same slice is shown for both images. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Visualization Examples
item.description: Visualization Examples: Example 1: Synchronous view of two images Example 2: Creating a magnifier

item.title: Contour Example 1: Creation of Contours
item.description: Contour Example 1: Creation of Contours This example shows how to create CSOs using SoCSOEditor modules. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Marker Example 1: Distance between markers
item.description: Marker Example 1: Distance between markers This examples shows how to create markers in a viewer and measure their distance. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Open Inventor Example 1: Open Inventor objects
item.description: Open Inventor Example 1: Open Inventor objects In this example a simple Open Inventor scene is created. The Open Inventor scene shows three objects of different color and shape. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Visualization Example 2: Creating a magnifier
item.description: Visualization Example 2: Creating a magnifier This example shows how to create a magnifier. Using the module SubImage a fraction of the original image can be extracted and enlarged. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Visualization Example 3: Image overlays
item.description: Visualization Example 3: Image overlays This example shows the creation of an overlay. Using the module SoView2DOverlay, an overlay can be blended over a 2D image. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Visualization Example 4: Display images converted to Open Inventor scene objects
item.description: Visualization Example 4: Display images converted to Open Inventor scene objects This example shows how to convert images to Open Inventor scene objects using the module SoView2D and modules based on SoView2D. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Visualization Example 5: Volume rendering and interactions
item.description: Visualization Example 5: Volume rendering and interactions This example shows the volume rendering of a scan. The texture of the volume is edited and animations are implemented. Download You can download the example network here
